hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Liquidity Rotation Regime Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When ETH/BTC pair experiences >25% increase in relative volume (vs 20-day average) while price remains rangebound (±2%), the next regime shift (within 10 days) favors the asset with increasing liquidity share at 70% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Institutional capital rotates between majors before regime changes. Volume spikes without price movement suggest accumulation/distribution. ETH/BTC is the primary rotation pair for smart money positioning.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC trading volume >125% of its 20-day average for 2 consecutive days
ETH/BTC price remains within 2% of 10-day range
Cross-exchange volume patterns confirm (not single venue anomaly)
No major ETH or BTC-specific news/events

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime classification changes (BULL/NEUTRAL/BEAR/STRESS) AND favored asset outperforms by >3%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Regime changes but favored asset underperforms by >2%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Volume spikes in ETH/BTC show no predictive power for regime direction (<55% accuracy) or regime transitions occur without preceding volume anomalies.
